articles.author: Swati Gupta, Jessie Yeung
articles.title: Explosion kills at least 19, injures dozens in Bangladesh's capital - CNN
articles.description: An explosion ripped through a building in a crowded area of Bangladesh's capital on Tuesday, killing at least 19 people and injuring more than 50 others, according to authorities in the South Asian country.
